description: Conceptually similar to the abrupt 4xCO2 DECK experiment, except that the solar constant rather than CO2 is abruptly increased by 4%.
long_name: Abrupt 4 percent increase of the solar constant
rationale: To provide a useful complement to the DECK abrupt4xCO2 experiment. To examine responses in the climate sytem due to changes in solar forcing and how they differ from changes due to CO2.

requirements.description: Begin in 1850 and run for 150 years.
requirements.label: 1850-1999 150yrs

requirements.description: Impose an abrupt 4% increase in the solar constant
requirements.label: abrupt +4 percent Solar

requirements.canonical_name: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2 and Solar
requirements.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding carbon dioxide (CO2) and solar forcing.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2, excluding solar
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2 and Solar

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
